**Testing with BRMS Business-Central**

**13**^**th**^**December 2016**

**NOTE** :**In order to run a test case , one need to run the
business-central UI.**

\

Basic Steps {.western style="margin-top: 0cm; line-height: 150%"}
===========

​1. go to link
[http://\<hostName\>:8080/business-central/kie-drools-wb.jsp](http://localhost:8080/business-central/kie-drools-wb.jsp)

​2. login using username/password as jboss/jboss@123.

​3. Open Project Authoring.

​4. At the left panel there will be Test Scenarios section.

​5. Click on Test Scenarios, It will open the already created test
cases.

​6. Click on any of them and at the right panel you will see the detail
of that test scenario.

​7. At the right panel at the top right you can see the run scenario
button ,clicking on that button the output of the test scenario will be
generated.

\

### For Premium Calculation Testing {.western style="line-height: 150%"}

8 go to link
[](http://111.93.34.137:8080/business-central/test-scenarios/scenario-)[*http://111.93.34.137:8080/business-central/\<product-name\>test-scenarios/scenario-*](http://111.93.34.137:8080/business-central/test-scenarios/scenario-)*\<scenario-number\>.html***(numbers
are simple 1,2,3 etc that you need to pass when you are creating the
test scenario).**

9**.** \<scenario-number\> is the **testCaseNum** property which you
have provided

while creating test scenario**and \<product-name\>**is appended at the
last in the urls.

​10. The data can be verified over here(the above link)

\

### **For Sum Assured Calculation Testing(**reverse product**)** {.western style="line-height: 150%"}

​11. You can verify then and there only.

​12. If correct it will show you green color and if wrong it will show
you red color.

\

\

\

\

**Rest API Details for iDecimal**

**13**^**th**^**December 2016**

Product 1(a) - FIGPlus {.western style="line-height: 115%"}
======================

### URL : {.western style="line-height: 100%"}

[http://111.93.34.137:8080/kie-server/services/rest/server/containers/instances/FIGplus](http://111.93.34.137:8080/kie-server/services/rest/server/containers/instances/FIGplus)

### Method : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

POST

### Header : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

Accept: application/json

Content-Type: application/json

### \
 {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

### Request Payload Description : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

  ------------------------------------------------------
  "dhfl\_idecimal.decimal\_dhfl.domain.FIGInput": {

  "policyTerm": { type : int },

  "premiumPaymentTerm": { type : int},

  "premiumPaymentMode": { type : String

  Values : “Annual”, “Semi-Annual”, “Monthly”},

  "Age": { type : int},

  "basicSumAssured": { type : double},

  "extraMortalityRate\_rate": { type : double},

  "occupationalFlatExtra\_rate":{ type : double},

  "otherFlatExtra\_rate":{ type : double},

  "nsapFlatExtra\_rate":{ type : double},

  "extraMortalityRate\_optedFor": { type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "occupationalFlatExtra\_optedFor":{ type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "otherFlatExtra\_optedFor":{ type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "nsapFlatExtra\_optedFor":{ type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  “extraMortalityRate\_duration”:{ type : Integer},

  “occupationalFlatExtra\_duration”:{ type : Integer},

  “otherFlatExtra\_duration”:{ type : Integer},

  “nsapFlatExtra\_duration”:{ type : Integer},

  "dateOfQuotation": { type : Date},

  "nameOfLifeAssured": { type : String},

  "dateOfBirth": { type : String},

  "Sex": { type : String,

  Values : “Male”, “Female”}

  }

  \
  ------------------------------------------------------

### \
 {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

### Request Payload Example : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

  ---------------------------------------------------------
  {

  "commands": [

  {

  "set-global": {

  "identifier": "outputList",

  "object": [],

  "out-identifier": "resultList"

  }

  },

  {

  "insert": {

  "out-identifier": "Input",

  "return-object": "false",

  "object": {

  ***"dhfl\_idecimal.decimal\_dhfl.domain.FIGInput": {***

  ***"policyTerm": 25,***

  ***"premiumPaymentTerm": 25,***

  ***"premiumPaymentMode": "Annual",***

  ***"age": 35,***

  ***"basicSumAssured": 1000000,***

  ***"extraMortalityRate\_rate" : 500,***

  ***"extraMortalityRate\_duration" : 25,***

  ***"extraMortalityRate\_optedFor" : "Yes",***

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_rate" : 2,***

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_duration" : 15,***

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_optedFor" : "No",***

  ***"otherFlatExtra\_rate" : 5,***

  ***"otherFlatExtra\_duration" : 4,***

  ***"otherFlatExtra\_optedFor" : "No",***

  ***"nsapFlatExtra\_rate" : 3,***

  ***"nsapFlatExtra\_duration" : 10,***

  ***"nsapFlatExtra\_optedFor" : "No",***

  ***"dateOfQuotation":null,***

  ***"nameOfLifeAssured":"Abhishek",***

  ***"dateOfBirth":null,***

  ***"sex":"Male"***

  }

  }

  }

  },

  {

  "fire-all-rules": {

  "outIdentifier": "output"

  }

  }

  ]

  }
  ---------------------------------------------------------

Product 1(b) - FIGPlus-Reverse {.western style="line-height: 115%"}
==============================

**NOTE :**URL, Method Type and Header will be the same as for FIgPlus

### \
 {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

### Request Payload Description : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

  -------------------------------------------------------
  "dhfl\_idecimal.decimal\_dhfl.domain.ReverseInput": {

  "age": {type : int},

  "sex" : { type : String,

  Values : “Male”, “Female”}

  "policyTerm": {type : int},

  "premiumPaymentTerm": {type : int},

  "premium": {type : double},

  "premiumPaymentMode": { type : String

  Values : “Annual”, “Semi-Annual”, “Monthly”},

  "occupationalFlatExtra\_optedFor": { type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "occupationalFlatExtra\_rate":{ type : double},

  “occupationalFlatExtra\_duration”:{ type : Integer},

  }

  \
  -------------------------------------------------------

### \
 {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

### Request Payload Example : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

  -------------------------------------------------------------
  {

  "commands": [{

  "insert": {

  "out-identifier": "Input",

  "object": {

  ***"dhfl\_idecimal.decimal\_dhfl.domain.ReverseInput": {***

  ***"age": 35,***

  ***"sex" : "Male",***

  ***"policyTerm": 20,***

  ***"premiumPaymentTerm": 20,***

  ***"premium": 2000,***

  ***"premiumPaymentMode": "Monthly",*********

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_rate" : 2,***

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_duration" : 15,***

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_optedFor" : "No",***

  }

  }

  }

  },{

  "fire-all-rules": {

  "outIdentifier": null

  }

  }]

  }

  \
  -------------------------------------------------------------

Product 2 - SmartFeeProtect {.western style="line-height: 115%"}
===========================

### URL : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

[http://111.93.34.137:8080/kie-server/services/rest/server/containers/instances/smartfeeprotect](http://111.93.34.137:8080/kie-server/services/rest/server/containers/instances/smartfeeprotect)

### Method : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

POST

### Header : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

Accept: application/json

Content-Type: application/json

### \
 {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

### Request Payload Description : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

  --------------------------------------------------------------------------
  "dhfl\_idecimal.decimal\_dhfl.domain.Input": {

  "isPremium": {type : Boolean

  Value : True(for Premium as input), False(for Monthly Income as Input)},

  "dateOfQuotation": { type : Date},

  "nameOfLifeAssured": { type : String},

  "dateOfBirth": { type : String},

  "sex": { type : String,

  Values : “Male”, “Female”},,

  "age": {type : int},

  "premiumPaymentMode": { type : String

  Values : “Annual”, “Semi-Annual”, “Monthly”},

  "policyTerm": {type : int},

  "premiumPaymentTerm": {type : int},

  "modalPremium": {type : double(when IsPremium : Ture)},

  "monthlyIncome": {type : double(when IsPremium : False)},

  "basePolicyExtraMortalityRate\_optedFor": { type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "basePolicyOccupationalFlatExtra\_optedFor": { type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "basePolicyOtherFlatExtra\_optedFor":{ type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "basePolicyNsapFlatExtra\_optedFor":{ type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "basePolicyExtraMortalityRate\_rate": { type : double},

  "basePolicyOccupationalFlatExtra\_rate": { type : double},

  "basePolicyOtherFlatExtra\_rate": { type : double},

  "basePolicyNsapFlatExtra\_rate": { type : double},

  "basePolicyExtraMortalityRate\_duration":{ type : double},

  "basePolicyOccupationalFlatExtra\_duration":{ type : double},

  "basePolicyOtherFlatExtra\_duration":{ type : double},

  "basePolicyNsapFlatExtra\_duration":{ type : double},

  "adbRider": { type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "adbSumAssured":{ type : double},

  "termOfAdbRider":{ type : int},

  "ciRider": { type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "ciSumAssured":{ type : double},

  "termOfCiRider":{ type : int},

  "adbRiderExtraMortalityRate\_optedFor": { type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "adbRiderFlatExtra\_optedFor": { type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "adbRiderExtraMortalityRate\_rate": { type : double},

  "adbRiderFlatExtra\_rate":{ type : double},

  "adbRiderExtraMortalityRate\_duration":{ type : double},

  "adbRiderFlatExtra\_duration":{ type : double},

  "ciRiderExtraMortalityRate\_optedFor":{type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "ciRiderFlatExtra\_optedFor": {type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "ciRiderExtraMortalityRate\_rate": { type : double},

  "ciRiderFlatExtra\_duration":{ type : double},

  "ciRiderExtraMortalityRate\_rate": { type : double},

  "ciRiderFlatExtra\_duration":{ type : double}, }
  --------------------------------------------------------------------------

\

### Request Payload Example : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

  ----------------------------------------------------------
  {

  "commands": [

  {

  "set-global": {

  "identifier": "output",

  "object": [],

  "out-identifier": "resultList"

  }

  },

  {

  "insert": {

  "out-identifier": "Input",

  "return-object": "false",

  "object": {

  ***"dhfl\_idecimal.decimal\_dhfl.domain.Input": {***

  ***"isPremium":true,***

  ***"dateOfQuotation":null,***

  ***"nameOfLifeAssured":"XYZ",***

  ***"dateOfBirth":null,***

  ***"sex":"Female",***

  ***"Age":50,***

  \

  ***"premiumPaymentMode":"Annual",***

  ***"policyTerm":10,***

  ***"premiumPaymentTerm":7,***

  ***"modalPremium":50000,***

  ***"monthlyIncome":10000,***

  \

  ***"basePolicyExtraMortalityRate\_optedFor":"No",***

  ***"basePolicyOccupationalFlatExtra\_optedFor":"Yes",***

  ***"basePolicyOtherFlatExtra\_optedFor":"No",***

  ***"basePolicyNsapFlatExtra\_optedFor":"No",***

  ***"basePolicyExtraMortalityRate\_rate":0.5,***

  ***"basePolicyOccupationalFlatExtra\_rate":2,***

  ***"basePolicyOtherFlatExtra\_rate":7,***

  ***"basePolicyNsapFlatExtra\_rate":2,***

  ***"basePolicyExtraMortalityRate\_duration":7,***

  ***"basePolicyOccupationalFlatExtra\_duration":7,***

  ***"basePolicyOtherFlatExtra\_duration":7,***

  ***"basePolicyNsapFlatExtra\_duration":7,***

  \

  ***"adbRider":"No",***

  ***"adbSumAssured":300000,***

  ***"termOfAdbRider":5,***

  ***"ciRider":"No",***

  ***"ciSumAssured":105000,***

  ***"termOfCiRider":6,***

  \

  ***"adbRiderExtraMortalityRate\_optedFor":"No",***

  ***"adbRiderFlatExtra\_optedFor":"No",***

  ***"adbRiderExtraMortalityRate\_rate":1.25,***

  ***"adbRiderFlatExtra\_rate":8,***

  ***"adbRiderExtraMortalityRate\_duration":5,***

  ***"adbRiderFlatExtra\_duration":5,***

  \

  ***"ciRiderExtraMortalityRate\_optedFor":"No",***

  ***"ciRiderFlatExtra\_optedFor":"No",***

  ***"ciRiderExtraMortalityRate\_rate":0.71,***

  ***"ciRiderFlatExtra\_rate":5,***

  ***"ciRiderExtraMortalityRate\_duration":0.13,***

  ***"ciRiderFlatExtra\_duration":5***

  }

  }

  }

  },

  {

  "fire-all-rules": {

  "outIdentifier": "output"

  }

  }

  ]

  }
  ----------------------------------------------------------

Product 3(a) - FlexiCash {.western style="line-height: 115%"}
========================

### URL : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

[http://111.93.34.137:8080/kie-server/services/rest/server/containers/instances/flexicash](http://111.93.34.137:8080/kie-server/services/rest/server/containers/instances/flexicash)

### Method : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

POST

### Header : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

Accept: application/json

Content-Type: application/json

\

### Request Payload Description : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

  ---------------------------------------------------------
  "dhfl\_idecimal.decimal\_dhfl.domain.FlexiCashInput": {

  "policyTerm": { type : int },

  "premiumPaymentMode": { type : String

  Values : “Annual”, “Semi-Annual”, “Monthly”},

  "Age": { type : int},

  "basicSumAssured": { type : double},

  "extraMortalityRate\_rate": { type : double},

  "occupationalFlatExtra\_rate":{ type : double},

  "otherFlatExtra\_rate":{ type : double},

  "nsapFlatExtra\_rate":{ type : double},

  "extraMortalityRate\_optedFor": { type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "occupationalFlatExtra\_optedFor":{ type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "otherFlatExtra\_optedFor":{ type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "nsapFlatExtra\_optedFor":{ type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  “extraMortalityRate\_duration”:{ type : Integer},

  “occupationalFlatExtra\_duration”:{ type : Integer},

  “otherFlatExtra\_duration”:{ type : Integer},

  “nsapFlatExtra\_duration”:{ type : Integer},

  "dateOfQuotation": { type : Date},

  "nameOfLifeAssured": { type : String},

  "dateOfBirth": { type : Date},

  "Sex": { type : String,

  Values : “Male”, “Female”}

  }
  ---------------------------------------------------------

\

### Request Payload Example : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

  ---------------------------------------------------------------
  {

  "commands": [

  {

  "set-global": {

  "identifier": "outputList",

  "object": [],

  "out-identifier": "resultList"

  }

  },

  {

  "insert": {

  "out-identifier": "Input",

  "return-object": "false",

  "object": {

  ***"dhfl\_idecimal.decimal\_dhfl.domain.FlexiCashInput": {***

  ***"policyTerm": 35,***

  ***"premiumPaymentMode": "Annual",***

  ***"age": 35,***

  ***"basicSumAssured": 1000000,***

  ***"extraMortalityRate\_rate" : 500,***

  ***"extraMortalityRate\_duration" : 25,***

  ***"extraMortalityRate\_optedFor" : "Yes",***

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_rate" : 2,***

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_duration" : 15,***

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_optedFor" : "No",***

  ***"otherFlatExtra\_rate" : 5,***

  ***"otherFlatExtra\_duration" : 4,***

  ***"otherFlatExtra\_optedFor" : "No",***

  ***"nsapFlatExtra\_rate" : 3,***

  ***"nsapFlatExtra\_duration" : 10,***

  ***"nsapFlatExtra\_optedFor" : "No",***

  ***"dateOfQuotation":null,***

  ***"nameOfLifeAssured":"Abhishek",***

  ***"dateOfBirth":null,***

  ***"sex":"Male"***

  }

  }

  }

  },

  {

  "fire-all-rules": {

  "outIdentifier": "output"

  }

  }

  ]

  }
  ---------------------------------------------------------------

Product 3(b) - FlexiCash-Reverse {.western style="line-height: 115%"}
================================

**NOTE :**URL, Method Type and Header will be the same as for FlexiCash

### \
 {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

### Request Payload Description : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

  -------------------------------------------------------
  "dhfl\_idecimal.decimal\_dhfl.domain.ReverseInput": {

  "age": {type : int},

  "sex" : { type : String,

  Values : “Male”, “Female”}

  "policyTerm": {type : int},

  "premium": {type : double},

  "premiumPaymentMode": { type : String

  Values : “Annual”, “Semi-Annual”, “Monthly”},

  "occupationalFlatExtra\_optedFor": { type : String,

  Values : “No”, “Yes”},

  "occupationalFlatExtra\_rate":{ type : double},

  “occupationalFlatExtra\_duration”:{ type : Integer}

  }

  \
  -------------------------------------------------------

### \
 {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

### Request Payload Example : {.western style="line-height: 115%"}

  -------------------------------------------------------------
  {

  "commands": [{

  "insert": {

  "out-identifier": "Input",

  "object": {

  ***"dhfl\_idecimal.decimal\_dhfl.domain.ReverseInput": {***

  ***"age": 35,***

  ***"sex" : "Male",***

  ***"policyTerm": 35,***

  ***"premium": 500000,***

  ***"premiumPaymentMode": "Monthly",***

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_rate" : 2,***

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_duration" : 15,***

  ***"occupationalFlatExtra\_optedFor" : "No",***

  }

  }

  }

  },{

  "fire-all-rules": {

  "outIdentifier": null

  }

  }]

  }
  -------------------------------------------------------------

\

\
